An automatic and manually driven Arduino car.
Begin by toggling bluetooth on by clicking the toggle bluetooth switch, unless bluetooth is already activated on your phone.
After you have toggled bluetooth on, simply click the Control Car button located above the toggle bluetooth switch to start driving!

To control the car manually, click any of the buttons to choose which way the car goes. 
 Your options are: 
 - Forward 
 - Left 
 - Right 
 - Backwards
Pressing the stop button will stop the car when you are driving manually.
Pressing the Manual button will put the car in automatic driving mode. You will not be able to press the manual driving buttons in this mode.
